body.name: Tow Truck Toy Flatbed and Crane with Race Car Playset - Large 15" Toys Rescue Vehicle w/Friction Push & Go, Lights & Sounds, Birthday Gift for Kids, Toddlers, Girls, Tow Truck Toys for Boys Ages 3-8
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 22 hrs 43 mins
features: SUPER EXCITING MECHANICAL FEATURES: The MOBIUS Toys tow truck toy with race car playset delivers non-stop, action-packed fun for kids ages 3-8. Powered by an innovative air action button, the crane boom lifts and rotates, enabling children to skillfully lift the race car onto the flatbed with a 60-degree rotation left or right for immersive towing adventures.

PUSH & GO! INTERACTIVE TOY FOR LIFELIKE ADVENTURES: Immerse your boys and girls in a realistic towing experience with the flatbed that lifts and slides, mimicking a real tow truck. The friction-powered push & go feature means this large tow truck travels far distances, accompanied by authentic lights and sounds, delivering an extra layer of excitement to imaginative play.

KIDS BUILD SKILLS WHILE THEY PLAY: Overall tow truck toy dimensions measure 15 x 4.5 x 9 inches. This tow truck playset is not only sizeable but also jam-packed with engaging features that foster fine motor skill development, including a pump button that raises the crane, a functional rope with a handle to lift the race car, a side switch to lower the arm, and a knob for adjusting the boom, providing endless hours of interactive and imaginative play.

THE PERFECT CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR THE HOLIDAY SEASON: This super fun tow truck and race car stands out as the Ultimate Christmas gift idea during the holidays for boys aged 3-8, combining durability with entertaining functions that make it a memorable and cherished present. Allow kids to delve into a world of creative play with the added superior rubber tires for enhanced grip and longevity. Our amazing Toy Tow Truck arrives in a beautiful Gift Box, suitable for kids 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 years old.

2 YEAR MANUFACTURER WARRANTY. PLUS, COOL ROAD SIGNS & ACCESSORIES: Our tow truck toy playset stands out with quality craftsmanship and durable ABS plastic construction, ensuring premium and long-lasting quality that withstands the rigors of enthusiastic play. Elevate your kids' playtime adventure with included accessories such as road signs and traffic cones, creating a dynamic and realistic towing landscape that enhances the overall play experience for even more enjoyable towing adventures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lots of moving parts for kid to play with.Built well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son for Christmas and though a bit on the pricey side, he has loved it. It’s well made and very interactive and surprisingly realistic! I would recommend for any kid who loves construction toys!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Easter for assembly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice truckGrandson with disabililikes it,
reviews.reviewText: Nice truck for the “moment” for my grandson, but like other toys he always ready for a new one. So I hide it and bring it back in 4 to 5 weeks. It is sturdyLouis

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No very durable
reviews.reviewText: After reading many reviews I selected this toy truck over others as I thought it would be the most durable while also having the desired features. I was disappointed at how cheaply it was made and how flimsy the towline was. Probably won't last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 4 year old grandson got this for his birthday and loved it. Just complicated enough to be interesting and simple enough to be fun. Extra sounds and flashing lights for good measure. Everything works as it should and seems to be reasonably durable. It's a good size for his age. It's a truck, too, so it can be pushed around for fun. You won't go wrong here if your young one is into trucks and equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
